script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
蜻蛉切を誘って
街に出かけた

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "angry"
# voice 3024 "tonbokiri_0011"
@蜻蛉切
いい、殿？
変なやつに絡まれないように
私から離れないで！

# textflame 0 0
@
そう言って
ピッタリと側を歩く蜻蛉切

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# voice 3024 "tonbokiri_0021"
@蜻蛉切
…あっ
いい匂い…！

# select "カレーかな" "select_label_01" "焼肉かな" "select_label_02" "おでんだね" "select_label_03"
…あっ
いい匂い…！

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
